attributes.action: stop treating us all like children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This government, rather than going for jugular and creating real deterrents for those committing grave criminal acts(i.e. the death penalty) have instead heavily over-legislated in every area of our lives.  This government penalises the majority (through over-legislation) as a reaction to the very few grave crimal acts of a few people in this country.  They do not trust the British people and they treat the British people like children instead of enpowering them to lead a life with moral direction.  Everyone who cares about social and community freedoms in this country should sign this petition and send a message to Mr Brown that we are SICK and TIRED of the lack of trust and interference.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
